table.name: carto_layers
table.remarks: Year-specific data layers defined in CartoDB used to display contextual layers.

column.name: identifier
column.remarks: Identifier of the CartoDB named map, e.g. brazil_biomes; unique in scope of contextual layer

column.name: years
column.remarks: Array of years for which to show this carto layer in scope of contextual layer; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: raster_url
column.remarks: Url of raster layer

table.name: chart_attributes
table.remarks: Attributes (inds/quals/quants) to display in a chart.

column.name: chart_id
column.remarks: Refence to chart

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of chart

column.name: years
column.remarks: Array of years for which to show this attribute in scope of chart; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Name of attribute for display in chart

column.name: legend_name
column.remarks: Legend title; you can use {{commodity_name}}, {{company_name}}, {{jurisdiction_name}} and {{year}}

column.name: display_type
column.remarks: Type of display, only used for trajectory deforestation plot in place profiles; e.g. area, line

column.name: display_style
column.remarks: Style of display, only used for trajectory deforestation plot in place profiles; e.g. area-pink, area-black, line-dashed-black

column.name: state_average
column.remarks: Only used for trajectory deforestation plot in place profiles

column.name: identifier
column.remarks: Identifier used to map this chart attribute to a part of code which contains calculation logic

table.name: chart_inds
table.remarks: Inds to display in a chart (see chart_attributes.)

table.name: chart_node_types
table.remarks: Node types to display in a chart.

column.name: chart_id
column.remarks: Refence to chart

column.name: node_type_id
column.remarks: Refence to node type

column.name: identifier
column.remarks: Identifier used to map this chart node type to a part of code which contains calculation logic

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of chart; required when more than one

table.name: chart_quals
table.remarks: Quals to display in a chart (see chart_attributes.)

table.name: chart_quants
table.remarks: Quants to display in a chart (see chart_attributes.)

column.name: parent_id
column.remarks: Self-reference to parent used to define complex charts, e.g. table with values in tabs

column.name: identifier
column.remarks: Identifier used to map this chart to a part of code which contains calculation logic

column.name: title
column.remarks: Title of chart for display; you can use {{commodity_name}}, {{company_name}}, {{jurisdiction_name}} and {{year}}

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of profile

table.name: commodities
table.remarks: Commodities in supply chains, such as soy or beef

column.name: name
column.remarks: Commodity name; unique across commodities

column.name: column_group
column.remarks: Zero-based number of sankey column in which to display nodes of this type

column.name: is_default
column.remarks: When set, show this node type as default (only use for one)

column.name: is_geo_column
column.remarks: When set, show nodes on map

column.name: is_choropleth_disabled
column.remarks: When set, do not display the map choropleth

table.name: context_node_types
table.remarks: Node types represented in supply chains per context. The value of column_position is interpreted as position in flows.path.

column.name: column_position
column.remarks: Index of node of this type in flows.path

table.name: context_properties
table.remarks: Visualisation properties of a context (one row per context)

column.name: default_basemap
column.remarks: Default basemap for this context, e.g. satellite

column.name: is_disabled
column.remarks: When set, do not show this context

column.name: is_default
column.remarks: When set, show this context as default (only use for one)

column.name: is_subnational
column.remarks: When set, show indication that sub-national level data is available

column.name: is_highlighted
column.remarks: When set, shows the context on the context picker suggestions

column.name: years
column.remarks: Years for which country-commodity data is present; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: default_year
column.remarks: Default year for this context

table.name: contextual_layers
table.remarks: Additional layers shown on map coming from CartoDB

column.name: title
column.remarks: Title of layer for display

column.name: identifier
column.remarks: Identifier of layer, e.g. brazil_biomes

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of context

column.name: tooltip_text
column.remarks: Tooltip text

column.name: is_default
column.remarks: When set, show this layer by default

column.name: legend
column.remarks: Legend as HTML snippet

column.name: name
column.remarks: Country name

column.name: iso2
column.remarks: 2-letter ISO code

column.name: latitude
column.remarks: Country latitide

column.name: longitude
column.remarks: Country longitude

column.name: zoom
column.remarks: Zoom level (0-18)

column.name: annotation_position_x_pos
column.remarks: X position (in coordinates) where the country's label is displayed on the explore page

column.name: annotation_position_y_pos
column.remarks: Y position (in coordinates) where the country's label is displayed on the explore page

table.name: dashboards_attribute_groups
table.remarks: Groups attributes (inds/quals/quants) to display on dashboards wizard

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name for display

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of group

table.name: database_updates
table.remarks: Keeping track of database update operations, also used to ensure only one update processed at a time

column.name: stats
column.remarks: JSON structure with information on row counts for all tables before / after update

column.name: jid
column.remarks: Job ID, filled in when update started using a background job processor

column.name: status
column.remarks: STARTED (only one at a time), FINISHED or FAILED

column.name: error
column.remarks: Exception message for failed updates

table.name: database_validation_reports
table.remarks: Keeping track of database validation operations

column.name: report
column.remarks: JSON structure with validation report

column.name: error_count
column.remarks: Count of errors detected

column.name: warning_count
column.remarks: Count of warnings detected

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of context

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Name of attribute for display in downloads

column.name: years
column.remarks: Years for which attribute is present; empty (NULL) for all years

table.name: download_flows_v
table.viewSql: SELECT f.context_id, f.year, f.path, f.jsonb_path, fi.original_type, fi.original_id, fi.name AS attribute_name, string_agg(fi.text_value, ' / '::text) AS text_values, sum(fi.numeric_value) AS sum, CASE WHEN (fi.original_type = 'Qual'::text) THEN string_agg(DISTINCT fi.text_value, ' / '::text) ELSE (sum(fi.numeric_value))::text END AS total FROM (flows_mv f JOIN ( SELECT f_1.flow_id, f_1.qual_id AS original_id, 'Qual'::text AS original_type, NULL::double precision AS numeric_value, f_1.value AS text_value, q.name, NULL::text AS unit FROM (flow_quals f_1 JOIN quals q ON ((f_1.qual_id = q.id))) GROUP BY f_1.flow_id, f_1.qual_id, f_1.value, q.name UNION ALL SELECT f_1.flow_id, f_1.quant_id, 'Quant'::text AS text, f_1.value, NULL::text AS text, q.name, q.unit FROM (flow_quants f_1 JOIN quants q ON ((f_1.quant_id = q.id))) GROUP BY f_1.flow_id, f_1.quant_id, f_1.value, q.name, q.unit) fi ON ((f.id = fi.flow_id))) GROUP BY f.context_id, f.year, f.path, f.jsonb_path, fi.original_type, fi.original_id, fi.name;

table.name: download_quals
table.remarks: Quals to include in downloads (see download_attributes.)

column.name: is_filter_enabled
column.remarks: When set, enable selection of discreet values (advanced filter)

table.name: download_quants
table.remarks: Quants to include in downloads (see download_attributes.)

column.name: is_filter_enabled
column.remarks: When set, enable selection of value ranges (advanced filter)

column.name: filter_bands
column.remarks: Array of value ranges to allow filtering by

column.name: symbol
column.remarks: Version symbol (included in downloaded file name)

column.name: is_current
column.remarks: When set, use this version symbol for new downloads (only use for one)

column.name: value
column.remarks: Numeric value

column.name: value
column.remarks: Textual value

column.name: value
column.remarks: Numeric value

column.name: path
column.remarks: Array of node ids which constitute the supply chain, where position of node in this array is linked to the value of column_position in context_node_types

column.name: tooltip_text
column.remarks: Commodity-specific tooltips are the third-most specific tooltips that can be defined after context and country-specific tooltips; in absence of a commodity-specific tooltip, a generic tooltip will be used.

column.name: commodity_id
column.remarks: Reference to commodity

column.name: ind_id
column.remarks: Reference to ind

table.name: ind_context_properties
table.remarks: Context specific properties for ind (like tooltip text)

column.name: tooltip_text
column.remarks: Context-specific tooltips are the most specific tooltips that can be defined; in absence of a context-specific tooltip, a country-specific tooltip will be used (if any).

column.name: context_id
column.remarks: Reference to context

column.name: ind_id
column.remarks: Reference to ind

column.name: tooltip_text
column.remarks: Country-specific tooltips are the second-most specific tooltips that can be defined after context-specific tooltips; in absence of a country-specific tooltip, a commodity-specific tooltip will be used (if any).

column.name: country_id
column.remarks: Reference to country

column.name: ind_id
column.remarks: Reference to ind

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Name of attribute for display

column.name: unit_type
column.remarks: Type of unit, e.g. score. One of restricted set of values.

column.name: tooltip_text
column.remarks: Generic tooltip text (lowest precedence)

column.name: is_visible_on_place_profile
column.remarks: Whether to display this attribute on place profile

column.name: is_visible_on_actor_profile
column.remarks: Whether to display this attribute on actor profile

column.name: is_temporal_on_place_profile
column.remarks: Whether attribute has temporal data on place profile

column.name: is_temporal_on_actor_profile
column.remarks: Whether attribute has temporal data on actor profile

column.name: name
column.remarks: Attribute short name, e.g. FOREST_500; those literals are referred to in code, therefore should not be changed without notice

column.name: unit
column.remarks: Unit in which values for this attribute are given

table.name: map_attribute_groups
table.remarks: Groups attributes (inds/quals/quants) to display on map

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name for display

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of context

column.name: position
column.remarks: Display order in scope of group

column.name: dual_layer_buckets
column.remarks: Choropleth buckets for dual dimension choropleth

column.name: single_layer_buckets
column.remarks: Choropleth buckets for single dimension choropleth

column.name: color_scale
column.remarks: Choropleth colour scale, e.g. blue

column.name: years
column.remarks: Years for which attribute is present; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: is_disabled
column.remarks: When set, this attribute is not displayed

column.name: is_default
column.remarks: When set, show this attribute by default. A maximum of 2 attributes per context may be set as default.

table.name: map_inds
table.remarks: Inds to display on map (see map_attributes.)

table.name: map_quants
table.remarks: Quants to display on map (see map_attributes.)

column.name: year
column.remarks: Year; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: value
column.remarks: Numeric value

column.name: is_domestic_consumption
column.remarks: When set, assume domestic trade

column.name: year
column.remarks: Year; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: value
column.remarks: Textual value

column.name: year
column.remarks: Year; empty (NULL) for all years

column.name: value
column.remarks: Numeric value

table.name: node_types
table.remarks: List of types of nodes in the system, e.g. MUNICIPALITY or EXPORTER. Those literals are referred to in code, therefore should not be changed without notice.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of node type, spelt in capital letters; unique across node types

table.name: nodes
table.remarks: Nodes of different types, such as MUNICIPALITY or EXPORTER, which participate in supply chains

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of node

column.name: geo_id
column.remarks: 2-letter iso code in case of country nodes; other geo identifiers possible for other node types

column.name: is_unknown
column.remarks: When set, node was not possible to identify

column.name: main_id
column.remarks: Node identifier from Main DB

table.name: pg_stat_statements
table.viewSql: SELECT pg_stat_statements.userid, pg_stat_statements.dbid, pg_stat_statements.queryid, pg_stat_statements.query, pg_stat_statements.calls, pg_stat_statements.total_time, pg_stat_statements.min_time, pg_stat_statements.max_time, pg_stat_statements.mean_time, pg_stat_statements.stddev_time, pg_stat_statements.rows, pg_stat_statements.shared_blks_hit, pg_stat_statements.shared_blks_read, pg_stat_statements.shared_blks_dirtied, pg_stat_statements.shared_blks_written, pg_stat_statements.local_blks_hit, pg_stat_statements.local_blks_read, pg_stat_statements.local_blks_dirtied, pg_stat_statements.local_blks_written, pg_stat_statements.temp_blks_read, pg_stat_statements.temp_blks_written, pg_stat_statements.blk_read_time, pg_stat_statements.blk_write_time FROM pg_stat_statements(true) pg_stat_statements(userid, dbid, queryid, query, calls, total_time, min_time, max_time, mean_time, stddev_time, rows, shared_blks_hit, shared_blks_read, shared_blks_dirtied, shared_blks_written, local_blks_hit, local_blks_read, local_blks_dirtied, local_blks_written, temp_blks_read, temp_blks_written, blk_read_time, blk_write_time);

column.name: name
column.remarks: Profile name, either actor or place. One of restricted set of values.

column.name: main_topojson_path
column.remarks: Path must be relative to https://github.com/Vizzuality/trase/tree/develop/frontend/public/vector_layers and start with /

column.name: main_topojson_root
column.remarks: Path within the TopoJSON file where geometries are contained

column.name: adm_1_topojson_path
column.remarks: Path must be relative to https://github.com/Vizzuality/trase/tree/develop/frontend/public/vector_layers and start with /

column.name: adm_1_topojson_root
column.remarks: Path within the TopoJSON file where geometries are contained

column.name: adm_2_topojson_path
column.remarks: Path must be relative to https://github.com/Vizzuality/trase/tree/develop/frontend/public/vector_layers and start with /

column.name: adm_2_topojson_root
column.remarks: Path within the TopoJSON file where geometries are contained
